array1.name: /belt
array1.command: #split rem belt;put belt backpack;get 2.belt backpack;wear belt;wear all belt

array2.name: /leather
array2.command: #split rem all.metal;wear shield;get all.leather backpack;wear all.leather;put all.metal backpack

array3.name: /metal
array3.command: #split rem all.leather;get all.metal backpack;wear all.metal;put all.leather backpack

array4.name: /forest
array4.command: #split rem fur;put fur backpack;get cloak pack;wear cloak

array5.name: /cloak
array5.command: #split rem cloak;put cloak backpack;get 2.cloak backpack;wear cloak

array6.name: /fur
array6.command: #split rem cloak;put cloak backpack;get fur backpack;wear fur

array7.name: /boots
array7.command: #split rem boots;put boots backpack;get 2.boots backpack;wear boots

array8.name: /shield
array8.command: #split rem shield;put shield backpack;get 2,shield backpack;wear shield

array9.name: /%j
array9.command: #split change editor line;/room description;%j;%e;change editor mume;look

array10.name: /pipe
array10.command: #split get pipe backpack;sheath;hold pipe;rest;smoke;stand;draw;put pipe backpack

array11.name: /sring
array11.command: #split remove rubyring;put rubyring backpack;get sapphire backpack;wear sapphire

array12.name: /rring
array12.command: #split remove sapphire;put sapphire backpack;get rubyring backpack;wear rubyring

array13.name: /t
array13.command: #split remove shield;get tweapon backpack;sheath;wield tweapon;put shield backpack

array14.name: /s
array14.command: #split remove tweapon;get shield backpack;wear shield;draw;put tweapon backpack

array16.name: /draught
array16.command: #split get blood-vial all;get tarragon all;get bat-fur all;get salamander all;put blood-vial kit;put tarragon kit;put bat-fur kit;put salamander kit;mix kit

array18.name: xpcalc
array18.command: #script xpcnt_gain_xp = $1 - xpcnt_old_xp; xpcnt_session_xp += xpcnt_gain_xp; xpcnt_gain_tp = $2 - xpcnt_old_tp; xpcnt_session_tp += xpcnt_gain_tp; xpcnt_old_xp = $1; xpcnt_old_tp = $2; xpcnt_need_xp = $3; xpcnt_need_tp = $4;

array19.name: xpprint
array19.command:
#script print("- Gained: xp:" + xpcnt_gain_xp + "		tp:" + xpcnt_gain_tp + "
"); print("- Needed: xp:" + xpcnt_need_xp + "		tp:" + xpcnt_need_tp + "
"); print("- Session: xp:" + xpcnt_session_xp + "		tp:" + xpcnt_session_tp + " 		Session: " + xpcnt_session_time + " min.
"); print("- Rate: xp:" + xpcnt_hour_xp + "		tp:" + xpcnt_hour_tp + "
");

array20.name: xprate
array20.command: #script with (Math) {xpcnt_session_time = $1; xpcnt_hour_xp = floor(60 * xpcnt_session_xp/xpcnt_session_time); xpcnt_hour_tp = floor(60 * xpcnt_session_tp/xpcnt_session_time);}

array21.name: statbar
array21.command: #script with (Math) {print("Trip: " + xpcnt_session_xp + " xp, " + xpcnt_session_tp + " tp; " + floor(xpcnt_hour_xp/1000) + "k xp/hr, " + xpcnt_hour_tp + " tp/hr.\n");}
